Package camzup.core

Class Face2

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.Face2
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Face2>, java.lang.Iterable<Vert2>
public class Face2
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Vert2>, java.lang.Comparable<Face2>
Organizes components of a 2D mesh into a list of vertices that form a face. This is not used by a mesh internally; it is created upon retrieval from a mesh.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  Face2.Vert2Iterator
    An iterator, which allows a face's vertices to be accessed in an enhanced for loop.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    Vert2[] vertices
    The array of vertices in a face.

    Constructor Description
    Face2()
    The default constructor.
    Face2​(Vert2... vertices)
    Creates a face from an array of vertices.

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static Vec2 centerMean​(Face2 face, Vec2 target)
    Finds the center of a face by averaging all the coordinates in its list of vertices.

    • rotateZLocal

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      this mesh
